docs.text:
Home




Portal
 is an open source software that allows you to edit and build minecraft Mod from a web browser.


In addition to using the hosted environment, you can also host your own.


For details on how to prepare for Mod development using Portal, please click 
here
.


Otherwise, please see 
here
 for how to prepare for Mod development using Portal.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Portal  is an open source software that allows you to edit and build minecraft Mod from a web browser.  In addition to using the hosted environment, you can also host your own.  For details on how to prepare for Mod development using Portal, please click  here .  Otherwise, please see  here  for how to prepare for Mod development using Portal.
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
Storage


Local


Putting files into local storage.


Example:


"Config": {
    "Root": "./projectsroot"
}










Key


Type


Description










Root


string


Directory path. You can use both absolute and relative path.








Samba


Putting files into Samba server.


Example:


"Config": {

}










Key


Type


Description






















AzureBlob


Putting files into 
Azure Blob storage


Example:


"Config": {
    "ConnectionString": "DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=[account_name];AccountKey=[account_key];",
    "ProvideMethod": "Stream",
    "AccessPolicy": null
}










Key


Type


Description










ConnectionString


string


Certification to connect Azure Blob Storage.






ProvideMethod


string


Stream
 or 
Redirect






AccessPolicy


string


Used only when 
ProvideMethod
 is 
Redirect
. If defined, SAS url is generated with this policy.
